title: My Sadistic Master
alternative_title: 마이 새디스틱 마스터; My Sadistic Master
status: 마이 새디스틱 마스터; My Sadistic Master
description:
Description :
        Jin Yuan, a majo sub who has never played SM. Despite his pretty and cute appearance, he has never had a partner or lover. Because of his busy and hectic life and his timid personality, it is not easy for him to meet someone who suits his taste. Then one day, he finds a profile of a man he really likes on a BDSM app, but the last login date is N years ago. It seems hopeless, but Yuan keeps sending messages just in case, and finally receives a reply... [Do you want to die?] [Can't you see my age?] He feels a sense of guilt despite the man's age that he had not seen before and the harsh reply, and eventually goes to meet the man. As expected, he is his type, but he has a scary face, a threatening tattoo, and a man with a fierce aura that overwhelms his surroundings. Yuan feels a sense of threat that his strength will be robbed rather than BDSM play... Can I meet this man?+
